name: Chicken Luck
description:
Save your clumsy suicidal chicken from certain death!

You are a caring hen looking after your baby chicken. But there is a catch. Your chicken is either very stupid or is having suicidal thoughts. Call him off before some harm will be done and run quickly through environment full of dangers.

Controls

  • Mouse click moves hen
  • Double mouse click calls chicken

P.S.: It might not be easy.
P.S.S.: Endless runner - write your best score in the comments section ;)

Ludum Dare 46 Compo entry

Created for Ludum Dare 46 game jam.
Theme: Keep it alive
Link to Ludum Dare page

Compo games are created entirely from scratch by one person, in just 48 hours.
